properties.title: Lake Davos Munts
properties.abstract: This near-natural bathing lake is located more than 1'300 m above sea level, nestled in a protected area with hills and beautiful vantage points. Here you can bathe in the purest spring water.
properties.description:
This recreation centre in the beautiful Lumnezia mountains is alive with the beauty and uniqueness of nature. A former «Nackental lake», which over the course of millions of years had turned into a fen, has been partially excavated and sealed with natural materials. A near-natural lake was thus created.

In summer a large wading pool offers children exactly what they want - splashing, sloshing, wading and boating for all it's worth. A little brook with small waterfalls and ponds, inviting children to spend time exploring it and playing cheerful games, winds right through the middle of the terraced lawns.

On warm days a small tent village made up of hikers, cyclists and guests wanting to exchange their hotel room with a sleeping bag for a few nights, comes into being behind the hills in Davos Munts. With the construction of a beach volleyball court made of real sand the summer sports trend was catered for.
properties.name: Badesee Davos Munts
